channel.title: programming on Amarakon’s Website
channel.description: Recent content in programming on Amarakon’s Website

item.title: I Thoroughly Enjoy Harvard’s CS50 Online Course
item.description: Recall from my second article on this website that I did not like my school’s computer science club. I listed several reasons for it, and I will briefly summarize them here. The teacher taught in a traditional way rather than what I expected. Only the Python programming language is taught.

item.title: Programming is Invaluable for Everyone
item.description: Most people view programming as something that only a specific type of people are able to do and should do. This specific type of person is portrayed as a genius; smarter than everyone else. This means that they think most normal people are unable to learn programming because they are not smart enough.
